meanings.definition: The act or process of converting a device or system to use transistors.
meanings.sent1: The transistorization of our old radio made it more efficient.
meanings.sent2: The transistorization of electronics has revolutionized technology.
meanings.sent3: I attempted the transistorization of my toaster, but now it only makes weird noises.
meanings.sent4: Her room underwent a transistorization, turning it into a high-tech hub.
meanings.sent5: The transistorization of the car engine made it run smoother and faster.

meanings.definition: The state of being equipped with transistors.
meanings.sent1: The transistorization of the computer allowed for faster processing.
meanings.sent2: Modern devices rely on transistorization for their functionality.
meanings.sent3: The transistorization of the robot gave it a futuristic vibe.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like a complex circuit board, full of transistorization.
meanings.sent5: The transistorization of the city's infrastructure brought about technological advancements.
